changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, n.id, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, n.name AS name, classifier.name AS classifer, classification.name AS classification, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, n.version FROM facet n JOIN existential classification ON n.classification = classification.id JOIN existential classifier ON n.classifier = classifier.id JOIN existential u ON n.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON n.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
